title: Bug 102623: Image can't be refreshed after importing again.
OB: After importing an image named 'image1.jpg' into layout view, deleting the image file from outline view, and renaming 'image2.jpg' as 'image1.jpg', the image is not refreshed.
EB: The image should be refreshed and displayed correctly after importing it again.
SR: 1. Import an image named 'image1.jpg' into layout view. 2. Delete the image file from outline view. 3. Rename 'image2.jpg' as 'image1.jpg'. 4. Verify that the image is refreshed and displayed correctly.
